option.tooltip.elytrahud.showPercent:
If "Yes" the Elytra durability will be shown as the remaining percentage.
If "No" il will be shown as durability points.
option.tooltip.elytrahud.position:
0: Upper - Left corner
1: Upper - Right corner
2: Center - Left
3: Center - Right
4: Lower - Left corner
5: Left to hotbar
6: Right to hotbar (Default)
7: Lower - Right corner
